Name: Buri Mech Shard
Description: Used for refining gear parts. Increases the success rate of refinement when used, but its effectiveness is limited. Excessive use may pose safety risks, so it should not be overused. It is less valuable than stable Mech Shard products.
Description$english: Used for refining gear parts. Increases the success rate of refinement when used, but its effectiveness is limited. Excessive use may pose safety risks, so it should not be overused. It is less valuable than stable Mech Shard products.
Description2$english: A specially processed metal sheet of Bapharian Legacy, it is the crystallization of advanced theories and technologies of heritage experts.
